html:
12.31.17  6:33 pm   do parrots in england say stuff in an english accent? 

     they usually repeat sounds the way they hear it

12.31.17  6:11 pm   Do you think school is an accurate measurement of intelligence?

     i was unaware that school tries to measure that

12.31.17  6:06 pm   Will you be going out and drunk this evening? Or will you be working on the thing? 

     working

12.31.17  5:15 pm   Are you solar powered?

     yes

12.31.17  4:54 pm   How many medium sized things do you wanna make before doing short or long things?

     several more

12.31.17  4:29 pm   What the heck are modes for? Like, I get that it's basically taking a scale and changing the starting point (D dorian is C major, but starting on D, and E phrygian is C major but starting on E, etc)..

     that's how everyone explains it but that's not really a good way to understand what they're for

      but, like, what does any of that have to do with playing or writing music? I never really understood the significance of modes. I never think about them when playing or writing music.

     forget the idea of the way you explained it. think of them all with a C root. then i think you'll get it. u know the c major scale, right? ever wanted a flat 7 in that scale, and keeping the rest major? pow, thats mixolydian. ever wanted a minor scale with a natural 6? i bet you do, that would be sly. pow thats dorian. ever wanted to take a major scale and sharp the 4, for that childlike wonder in the intro to a steven spielberg movie? pow, thats lydian. hope that helps

12.31.17  4:10 pm   how did you feel about meeting the absolute legend redfoo at the shorty awards

     i did not meet him
12.31.17  4:01 pm   What are notes? (in music)

12.31.17  3:41 pm   why is a pencil called a pencil? i personally disapprove of it, too close to pen, which has a similar purpose and can easily get mixed up 

     ah, i see what you mean. i will change it

12.31.17  2:59 pm   what is one thing you like?

     shapes

12.31.17  2:42 pm   I need more videos please!!!

     i'm making them as fast as i can

12.31.17  2:29 pm   Thoughts on the word 'ghosts'? I think that the 'sts' sound should be banned from all languages. It's awkward and difficult to say.

     ok i will change it. i have submitted the paper-work and it should take effect in about 5 years. but don't complain to me when you can't tell the difference between ghots and goats

12.31.17  2:15 pm   Is it 2018 yet

     yes, in some parts of the world

12.31.17  1:41 pm   Favorite gene wilder movie?

     the willy wonka one

12.31.17  12:54 pm   should I feel bad that I'm not going out for New Years?

     you can feel bad if you want

12.31.17  12:42 pm   Is the job complete?

     some are complete, some are not. some have not even started yet

12.31.17  12:32 pm   Am I right in thinking that "rabbit snakes" is about going crazy because you're trapped in your own head, or is that just the meaning I'm applying to it because that's how I currently feel?

     it was more about songwriting, being frustrated knowing that a song can be written in absolutely any way, and yet still not knowing where to start. and finally just throwing up your arms and writing 'rabbit snakes' on a piece of paper, and see where it goes from there

12.31.17  11:05 am   If you wake up in the middle of the night and can't fall asleep, what do you do to pass the time?

     get back to work

12.31.17  10:27 am   Can you give me some advice on how to receive advice? 

     no

12.31.17  9:58 am   Why is it 2017 (turning 18)? Like, why is this the year number? What happened 2017 years ago that we are setting as year 1 AD? Doesn't it have something to do with jesus? 

     the calendar is based on a popular religion whose origin story takes place at that time

12.31.17  9:17 am   Have you ever bought pre-ripped jeans? 

     no. it is more fun to rip them myself

12.31.17  7:57 am   why are many people excited for new year?

     because they know it's going to be good

12.31.17  5:06 am   12.30.17  4:47 pm (Not the same person) Yeah but trying to make everything in a hurry doesn't make you sacrifice quality?

     after working on a project beyond a certain length of time you can get major fatigue and really get sick of it, and then the quality might go down

     Like you do risk making some choices instead of others just because of time.

     sometimes working on a tight time schedule can actually make you gravitate toward stronger, more important choices which you may have missed if you were stuck staring at the damn thing endlessly

      Wouldn't it be better to work on several songs at the same time and switching between them when/before you get tired? 

     i have tried that and what seems to happen is you get less and less confident about working on any of them, and you bounce back and forth and the momentum dwindles to zero

12.31.17  2:44 am   help i'm an idiot trapped inside an idiot's body

     what exactly seems to be the problem

12.31.17  2:02 am   what word is said most in your new video?

     de

12.31.17  1:01 am   Why does the glue on envelopes taste to good?

     to keep you coming back for more

12.31.17  12:34 am   Is love something to seek or something to avoid?

     you can try both

12.30.17  11:45 pm   What is the weirdest thing that you have ever seen?

     the world

12.30.17  11:42 pm   what's your favorite makeup brand

     there are so many great brands

12.30.17  10:54 pm   Do bob dylan's lyrics mean anything? 

     yes, they mean he is having fun, and enjoying himself, which i think is meaningful

12.30.17  9:59 pm   Is that guy from the apprentice the president now? 

     yes, of the united states

12.30.17  9:56 pm   Is your new song a love song? 

     not exactly, but i suspect there is love in every song

12.30.17  9:43 pm   Do you believe in god?

     how about something a little more interesting

12.30.17  9:15 pm   do you own an octahedron of transcendence

     no. back in my day we used to transcend with our bare hands and we liked it

12.30.17  9:05 pm   when i was little i used to be really scared of the voiceover that would play after mr roger's neighborhood

     that's weird i only recall costa shredding

12.30.17  9:02 pm   help i joined a music honor society and i don't know what to do pls help

     i can't help you, i don't know what that is. maybe get a nice shirt?

12.30.17  8:59 pm   do you have any other interests besides music

     making videos to go with the music

12.30.17  8:58 pm   what's your favorite song lyric

     it really doesn't matter. if i'm wrong i'm right. where i belong i'm right. (where i belong)

12.30.17  8:57 pm   are all words made up?

     sort of, but most of the small/common ones make themselves up very naturally and gradually, over a very long period of time

12.30.17  8:44 pm   Where do you get your ideas for videos from? Also when are you making a new video.

     always

      I need your content in my life.

12.30.17  8:29 pm   What do you think would be a constructive thing to do on a date?

     build a boat

12.30.17  8:14 pm   how come people say "we will be replaced by robots" when that is a lie?

     that's so you will be pleasantly surprised when it doesn't happen

12.30.17  7:57 pm   whats your favorite flower?

     power

12.30.17  7:38 pm   what longstanding grievances do you have?

     everything is too normal

12.30.17  5:40 pm   lebron or mj? 

     i can't see either did u forget the attachment

     yes and so can you

12.30.17  4:47 pm   I really enjoy making music, but sometimes I get fatigued of hearing the songs I make. I try to get rest when it happens, but I feel unproductive when I stop. What should I do?

     try to make them faster, before you get tired of them

     not right now

     If so what kind?

12.30.17  3:41 pm   Are you a sheep? 

     i will check

     both
